channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Factory 2030 runs on more than code. As a CEO, I see the power of agentic AI—and the trust gap that we must close
item.description: Autonomous systems often make headlines. But on the factory floor, the real goal is reliability. And that means keeping humans involved.

item.title: Quantum computing could be a $198 billion industry in the next 15 years, Jefferies analyst says
item.description: The downside is that the physics and engineering needed to make them work has only just moved out of the theoretical realm and into reality.

item.title: The Arsenal of Democracy Can’t Be Backordered
item.description: We must push harder to build a capable American defense system for the 21st century.

item.title: Spike Lee’s Affordability Thriller
item.description: Highest 2 Lowest remakes Kurosawa for the DNC.

item.title: The West’s Embrace Of Mass Third-World Migration Is Civilizational Suicide
item.description: The West's mass importation of Third-Worlders with no emphasis on assimilation has been, is, and will continue to be a complete failure.

item.title: ‘Robots are going to be amongst us’: Qualcomm exec says buckle up for the next 5 years. Your car is going to be the first shoe to drop
item.description: Driver-assisted technology demand is growing for AI features like hands-free highway assist.

item.title: Ford Pays the Price for Electric Vehicle Investments
item.description: Government mandates and subsidies drove the automaker to bet big on electric vehicles, leaving it now with a $19.5 billion loss.

item.title: Air traffic control towers will 'never' reach full staffing levels under current system, FAA chief says
item.description: FAA chief says air traffic control towers will "never" reach full staffing under current system, calling it "chronically understaffed."

item.title: Prices at the gas pump are the lowest since the pandemic and still falling—just in time for record-high holiday travel
